content: Research 2025 Enterprise Architecture Principles - TOGAF, Zachman, SABSA updates and new frameworks
Research Agentic AI Architecture Principles - patterns and frameworks specific to AI agent systems in 2025
Research High-Cognitive Principles - cognitive load management, decision-making frameworks for architecture
Research Mental Principles/Mental Toolkit - cognitive frameworks and thinking models for architects
Investigate Claude Code CLI & SDK - evaluate if they should be part of our tech stack and how they integrate
Synthesize findings to identify missing enterprise architecture principles in current framework
